events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your software development skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Our recruiter completed the initial screening of your resume and background, and you meet the core criteria for the Software Engineer position.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening questions and your willingness to proceed with the technical interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 16th at 10 AM UTC with our senior software engineers to assess your development skills.
